website_summaries.verdict: A premium pick for young players, and well worth the cost to protect their developing minds.
pros: Many colors and sizes to choose from

customer_reviews.title: FACEMASK NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: If you aren't including the face mask, please don't use this as the main picture. I easily looked over the fact that the facemask was not included with this purchase and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Powell

customer_reviews.title: XXS too big
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box for my son to be able to use for football practice. Unfortunately the helmet is too big for him. I also thought you could inflate the padding in the inside, but you cannot with this helmet. So now I’ll have to purchase another helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great helmet thus to small we are buyer a larger one
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit and bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: First of all it does not come with a facemask, and my son tryed a bunch of helmets and this is by far the worst, on top of that this company has not good. Cuatomer service and even though I bought it prime they made me pay for the return,
customer_reviews.author: ana najera

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was the helmet and facemask but when ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was the helmet and facemask but when received their was no face mask just the helmet and chin strap very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing helmet!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and I (mom) loves it as well. The padding to help cushion the inside is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and not worth $115
customer_reviews.text: These scratches were visible as soon as I pulled helmet from the box.
customer_reviews.author: John h

customer_reviews.title: Can I get a certification date sticker for my newly purchased helmet?
customer_reviews.text: Why did this helmet come with no Certification Date at the back of the helmet??? Helmets are required to be stamped with a date when they are new and need to be recertified every two years.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and awesome padding
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for his 2nd PeeWee season, much better padding than the helmet he got last year. You do have to get a face mask to go with the helmet and of course the logo and stripe to match your team (go Camden Bulls!) \m/ \m/ Fruit, D, and Nuck 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. Can’t beat this price for a good quality helmet. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Duriel Martin

product_meta.title: Schutt Sports Vengeance A3 Youth Football Helmet (Facemask NOT Included),
product_meta.description: Faceguard NOT included with helmet. The Schutt Vengeance A3 Youth Football Helmet has a lower profile shell to cut down the weight and make it one of the best new youth helmets on the market. The helmet includes the lower profile Vengeance shell, used in the Z10 and Vengeance Pro models, that makes it more managable for younger players. A combination of black and green TPU in both single and double layers offers protection against low-impact blows and high-impact hits. The Vengeance A3 has non-inflatable comfort liners inside the helmet to deliver the soft, pillow-like feel that Schutt is know for. Mechanically attached Inter-Link jaw pads have also been added to the helmet, giving you a secure fit in the lower part of your face. Lower profile shell design cuts down on weight Non-infalatable comfort liners Liner has TPU outer skin to give the helmet Schutt's "soft, pillow-like feel" Combination of single and double layer TPU in new black and green colorway Mechanically attached 1" black Inter-Link jaw pads stay in place Black twist release bumper, nose bumper and rear bumper Black Schutt youth soft cup chinstrap included This helmet does NOT include a facemask
feature_bullets: A sleeker re-designed Vengeance helmet shell that has a lower profile and is lighter than the original Vengeance Shell
Reducing a helmet’s weight is an important factor for youth helmets.
With non-inflatable Comfort Liners inside the helmet, as well as Inter-Link jaw pads mechanically attached to the helmet, the A3 is a high performance helmet at a great price point.
A wide variety of a position-specific.
